p: SFTSV causes an often-fatal disease (12 to 15% case fatality rate) that is characterized by thrombocytopenia, hemorrhagic manifestations, and multiorgan failure ( 2, 18). To date, there have been ∼8,500 reported cases of SFTS disease in China, more than 100 laboratory confirmed cases in both South Korea ( 4 – 6) and Japan ( 3, 19), and 2 cases reported in Vietnam ( 7).
